input_text.Prompt:
Given a product name and product features, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Product name:
NCAA Unisex-Adult Football Mat

Product features:
9-ounce, 100 % nylon face
Recycled vinyl backing for a durable and longer-lasting product
Machine-made and tufted in the USA
Non-skid backing with taped borders for added durability
Machine washable; vacuum regularly and spot clean for any easy and quick clean

Product description:
input_text.Response A: This high-quality product provides a safe, reliable and comfortable solution for all your football needs. It is engineered with a 9-ounce 100% nylon face and a recycled vinyl backing that ensures durability, stability and safety. This football mat is machine-made and tufted in the USA, which ensures that it meets the highest standards of quality and performance. It is easy to maintain as it is machine washable and vacuum-friendly, making it easier to clean and maintain. Moreover, the non-skid backing with taped borders ensures that the mat stays in place, even in high-traffic areas. With its technical features and advanced materials, this football mat is the ultimate solution for all your football needs.
input_text.Response B: The NCAA Unisex-Adult Football Mat is an exciting new product that is sure to make a big splash in the sports equipment market. This tufted football mat is made in the USA from high-quality, 9-ounce, 100% nylon face material with a durable, recycled vinyl backing. The mat features a non-skid backing with taped borders for superior durability and is conveniently machine-washable to make cleanup a breeze. With its bold colors and exciting sports-themed design, this mat will be a great addition to any home, tailgate party, or sports bar.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
